title: Spanish Fonts
content:
Im looking for some nice Spanish style fonts for a new master planned community in Southern Arizona and was wondering if anyone had some suggestions. I've been looking around but I haven't found to much that i've been impressed by. I found Espania, which is okay but still doesn't hit the nail on the head.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [espania.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130123071715/http:/typophile.com/files/espania.png) | 12.82 KB |
author: pantone354

comments.content:
A D V E R T I S E M E N T

Mário Feliciano has done some beautiful revivals of Iberian historical models, notably Rongel, Merlo, and Eudald. (The first two are available from Village.)  
 [http://vllg.com/Feliciano/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130123071715/http:/vllg.com/Feliciano/)
